extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed version of VMware vCenter Server or VMware Cloud Foundation.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to the Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the affected VMware vCenter Server or VMware Cloud Foundation to the latest version to mitigate the vulnerability.

cve_id: VMware vCenter Server and Cloud Foundation Vulnerability
affected_products: VMware Cloud Foundation (VMware vCenter Server) versions 4.x and 5.x
